    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114087</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Induced current in a conducting wire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geverursachter Strom in einer Leitleitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courant induit dans un fil de conduite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corrente induzida em um fio conduzindo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corrente indotta in un legare di condotta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προκληθέν ρεύμα σε ένα καλώδιο διεύθυνσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corriente inducida en un alambre que conduce</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that when a conducting wire moves downward through a magnetic flux, an induced current flows through the wire.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conducting wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß, wenn eine Leitleitung
abwärts durch einen magnetischen Fluß bewegt, ein geverursachter 
Strom die Leitung durchfließt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que quand un fil de 
conduite descend par un flux magnétique, un courant induit traverse 
le fil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que quando um fio 
conduzindo se move para baixo com um fluxo magnético, uma corrente 
induzida corre através do fio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che quando un legare
di condotta scende con un cambiamento continuo magnetico, una corrente
indotta attraversa il legare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι όταν κινείται 
προς τα κάτω ένα καλώδιο διεύθυνσης μέσω ενός μαγνητικού 
συλλιπάσματος, προκληθείσες παρούσες ροές μέσω του καλωδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que cuando un alambre
que conduce se mueve hacia abajo con un flux magnético, una corriente
inducida atraviesa el alambre.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitleitungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geverursachter Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetischer Fluß</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
